name: emptyspace.photo
description:
A minimalist photography portfolio leveraging Kirby 4 CMS. The design is intentionally sparse, drawing attention to the high-quality images and ease of navigation through ample whitespace.
Kirby 4's file-based system ensures resiliency for seamless content updates and tailored presentations. Design, development, and photography were done by me.

thumbnail.alt: A man floating underwater like the Nirvana Nevermind album cover. This image was shot with an underwater film camera.

problem.heading: Creating a visually compelling experience
problem.desc: In the realm of photography, the challenge lies not only in capturing stunning images but also in presenting them in a way that is both engaging and reflective of the photographer's unique style. A photography portfolio website must not only showcase the technical skill and creative vision of the photographer but also provide a seamless, intuitive user experience that draws viewers in and holds their attention. The design and functionality of the website must work harmoniously to create a visually compelling platform that enhances the photographs and communicates the photographer's professional identity effectively.

solution.heading: Minimal aesthetic, seamless client-side interface
solution.desc: Kirby 4's flexibility and performance, combined with a minimalist design approach, create a platform where visuals take center stage, offering visitors a cohesive and immersive viewing experience.

name: Newberry Development Associates
description: Newberry Development Associates constructs platforms in the digital space. This website features dynamic navigation with dark and light mode styles. A design system was created on top of this to establish a clear path for website expansion into future plans. The Kirby 4 CMS ensures simple client-sided updates to give emphasis on the idea of growth.

thumbnail.alt: NDA.dev light mode and dark mode page.

problem.heading: Establishing a web presence and opening up for growth
problem.desc: By implementing a versatile design system, the website is equipped to adapt and evolve, accommodating new content and features as the developer's portfolio grows. This strategic approach ensures that the website can scale seamlessly, enhancing the developer's web presence and facilitating professional growth in a competitive digital landscape.

solution.heading: A Memorable landing page
solution.desc: To create a memorable landing page for the developer's website, we utilized Kirby 4 CMS for its flexibility and ease of content management. Designed to captivate visitors immediately with a blend of aesthetic appeal and functional design, setting the stage for a compelling exploration of the developer's work.

images.alt: Desktop landing page on light mode
Mobile landing page on light mode

name: Gen Fram
description: Gen Fram is a platform to view all-inclusive and contemporary standards for design. It served as a source of inspiration for designers and developers alike. Through my duration on this project, I established an identity, designed a website, and accumulated 1.6+ million views on social media (mostly TikTok). Webflow was the website builder used, which allows for an intuitive approach to blog creation.

problem.heading: Defining a digital presence
problem.desc: The brand required a strong visual identity and a robust online platform, developed on Webflow, to showcase its comprehensive design ethos effectively. Additionally, the brand needed to engage and expand its audience through strategic social media content on Instagram and TikTok, platforms where visual appeal is paramount. The goal was to not only reflect the brand's commitment to design excellence but also to cultivate a community of followers who find value and inspiration in the brand's offerings.

solution.heading: A contemporary aesthetic
solution.desc: To embody a contemporary aesthetic, the brand's visual identity and Webflow-developed website were meticulously crafted to reflect cutting-edge design standards. This digital platform showcases a wide array of design inspirations, serving as a pivotal resource for both designers and developers seeking modern and inclusive design cues. The integration of visually compelling content on Instagram and TikTok further amplified the brand's reach, engaging a broader audience and fostering a community around contemporary design.

images.alt: Empty space web page for brand aesthetic

name: Stuart Blue Films
description: Stuart Blue is a filmmaker currently based in Chicago, working as a production assistant on television and movie sets in the city. His filmmaker portfolio website is a custom-designed and developed project that showcases his cinematic work using adaptive design principles and the Next.js framework with React. The website features distinct layouts optimized for various screen sizes, ensuring a tailored user experience across devices like smartphones, tablets, and desktops.

problem.heading: A portal to watch short films
problem.desc: The primary challenge lies in creating a user-friendly, adaptive web portal that efficiently showcases a diverse collection of short films. This platform must cater to varying user preferences and device specifications, ensuring seamless access and optimal viewing experiences across all digital environments.

solution.heading: An immersive experience
solution.desc: Next.js and React provided an adaptive, high-performance web portal. This solution provides a responsive, device-agnostic interface that delivers an immersive and interactive viewing experience for short films, tailored to meet the needs of a broad audience spectrum.
